phrases: I told you not to talk to me too much at school.
I want the drug that makes me normal again.
Before school started, you asked once, so you could formally quit your job.
What is it for this time?
I want to visit a grave.
I know you have done your homework.
You know about my senpai at that company, right?
You cannot go looking like this?
And risk running into someone else who worked with us?
Not that any of them will show up.
Then I will come with you.
Now, now, do not be mean.
I know you need to keep an eye on me, so just do it from a distance like always.
No need to come with me.
We know you froze up at Saiki-san's grave last year.
Worried you might impulsively follow her.
Or not be able to control yourself if a coworker shows up.
Anyone would go pale if someone tried to strangle them.
I did not apply that much pressure, though.
But you are doing better than you were right after you resigned.
You could not even tighten a necktie then.
You can visit the grave, and I will get you the medicine, but only if I can come with.
Do whatever you want, you sadist.
I did not give you one!
Trauma from the suicide of the senpai he would trained under
Writing a medicine request for Kaizaki-san and myself.
He wants to visit her grave.
If memory serves, it is dangerous for him to go alone.
For starters, they will only approve it for the assigned support.
I could totally go like this, though!
Two grown men and a high school girl?
I do not want the police questioning me.
I do have a favor to ask.
What is up with that suit?
How did you know it was a suit?
It is not often that you start a conversation.
The change is done in about an hour.
Should we spend the hour together, fighting off the drowsiness side effect?
Kaizaki-san, you wake up well, do not you?
Meanwhile, I am the type to sleep through alarms,
What do you do every morning?
If I have somewhere to be, I sleep sitting up so that I do not sleep that deeply.
How do you ever feel rested?
I mean, you have got to do your job on top of going to school.
You are even worrying about me!
You should really get a girlfriend who will wake you up.
I feel tired just thinking about her waking me up!
I bet she wakes up hyper.
You told me to wake you!
It is been four months since we met each other as adults.
Nice to meet you, Kaizaki Arata-san.
A third of the way through.
Did you just look sad because you were imagining this experiment ending?
Like I said, I am only in this for a year's living expenses and a job introduction.
We have been here a while.
Are you sure you are okay?
This was your first big sale!
I was a new hire, and she was my trainer.
She had the best sales record of any employee.
to be working under a woman in sales.
But Saiki Michiru-senpai was super friendly.
Daily overtime, hard work, and wages that in no way justified it.
The job I would struggled to find
was at one of those black companies.
Yet Senpai still visibly enjoyed her job.
I admired her, and she kept me going.
A lot of people do not like me just because I am a woman.
If you will not say anything, I will!
You are absolutely right, and I am glad you feel that way.
But I want you to stay out of it.
But I could not stand it.
She is in charge of his training, right?
Do not rat us out, Kaizaki.
Why do not you stop that already?
acted on my own sense of justice,
and wasted all her efforts to endure.
As a result, the harassment got even worse.
I always thought she was strong.
They have concluded it was suicide.
Make sure you keep this confidential.
If I had not done that...
If I had not butted in...
Who d'ya think'll get promoted instead of Saiki?
You are already doing this now?!
Saiki was very proud of our company.
I am sure that is why she chose to end things here.
She just loved this place that much.
I hold her much beloved company as my pride and joy.
What the hell is wrong with you all?!
Do not you feel anything at all?!
How can you act like nothing happened?!
Do not you think that maybe it was your fault?!
Do not take it out on the others.
Society will think you are gutless.
That fact'll be on your resume forever.
Do you think anyone else will hire you?
I will forget this ever happened.
I am afraid to go job-hunting again.
Only upper-level management gets to resign.
You went to grad school, and you do not know that?
We will not even notice you are gone.
Get out right this instant, you piece of shit!
Get lost, and do not ever come back!
I grew afraid to engage with people and society.
If I would been more grown-up...
If I would killed my emotions and tried to fit in,
could I have remained a productive member of society?
Coming here just fills me with regret.
We are from the same company, hired a year after you.
I have seen your face in a company album.
And the old hires talk about you a lot.
Yeah, I bet that place is still griping about me.
Boss still loves to bring up the story of the guy who quit after only three months.
He talks about Saiki-senpai like a fallen warrior.
We had no idea what a normal workplace was like.
We did not even know if we were working for a black company.
We would love to quit, but we are afraid everywhere is like this,
so we just grumble and keep going.
Like they are desperately hanging on to a thread that might snap at any second.
It feels like I am looking at myself from a year ago.
So it is an honor to meet you!
Giving that president a piece of your mind and walking out?
I was just a dumb kid.
We do not have the courage to take action.
Not everyone can do what you did.
You have no idea what a help it is been to know
we were not the only ones who thought our company was messed-up.
I never thought my rebellion would have such an effect.
Just... it would help to know.
After I quit, I could not do anything for a while.
But you have to work to live.
I started looking for another job.
The day of my first interview,
I realized I could not wear a necktie anymore.
When they asked me why I quit after three months,
I could not find the words to explain myself.
In time, I regained my ability to get through interviews,
but I never did get hired.
Then I got sick and tired of it all, gave up,
and got a job at a convenience store.
I am still doing part-time work.
It is kind of hard to face my friends with real jobs.
I am not selfless enough to give my one and only life to that shitty company!
but there are people I have met because I quit.
I am in a world I would never have experienced if I would stayed.
Your existence gives strength to the people who came after you.
That the new hires saw me in that light.
You arranged things so we would bump into each other there.
But why did you lie and say you were still doing part-time work?
You are a test subject, and you are getting paid enough to make ends meet.
I would call that a job.
Sure, but it is not a job I found myself.
I really did struggle after I quit.
And I wound up here because I did not find work.
It would be irresponsible to tell them I would found a real job again.
You will pretend you have work in front of your friends
but tell your juniors the truth?
No wonder you are a hero to them.
I do have a favor to ask.
I will be with Kaizaki-san the whole day,
so keep me updated on what these two are up to.
New hires this year at Kaizaki-san's old company.
They have visited Saiki-san's grave several times before.
I thought they might go on the anniversary of her death, too.
If he learns that what he did gives hope to those that came after him,
it might help him start looking forward.
You dug that deep for Kaizaki-san?
That is what the Support Division's supposed to do.
But will not they say you are getting too involved again?
I am just bringing them together.
The rest is up to Kaizaki-san.
I saw him talking to the new hires
but could not hear what they said.
I cannot stop thinking about it!
Yeah, I think he is feeling better.
I am glad I talked to them.
Knowing that my voice and Senpai's reached someone
does not erase the guilt I feel for not saving her,
Whenever I went there, I would always end up regretting everything.
And I am sure she was watching with a face that screamed, Get a hold of yourself!
I could finally tell her I was glad I would quit.
If I would been alone, I could not have said that.
All I did was stand there and watch.
You are still taking make-ups, Arata?
Summer break's almost here wait, what is with that nickname?!
